title: West advises London mayor
text:
Updated: 2:57 pm 
Rapper Kanye West has given London's mayor his top tips to improve the city. 
The hip-hop star faced questions from fans during a chat on fashion website SHOWstudio's In Camera series, which was streamed live online. 
Among those posing questions was London's top politician, Boris Johnson, who had a pertinent request for Kanye. 
Boris asked the rapper, "What would you do to make London better?" and Kayne divulged his plans to make the British capital a better place. 
The Stronger star urged Boris to improve traffic flow by widening the historic city's notoriously narrow streets. 
"Widen the street, because I get really scared when the drivers (sic)... When there's a big truck coming (sic)," Kanye explained. 
During the interview, Kanye also talked about his reality TV star wife Kim Kardashian, insisting he is outraged that she has failed to garner much critical acclaim for her popular series "Keeping Up With The Kardashians." 
"My wife and her family shoulda had plenty of Emmys by now," he declared, "I feel proud to be in a family that has so many people breaking ground for the generations to come. It's like, whoa, reality show! That's so f**king new as an art form." Copyright WENN.com
